title: Pixel 5 slowly charging after update
content: Noticed since the android 11 update the device started to charge very slow , I've tried multiple chargers in car at home by wire , wireless etc .... reset factory etc ....I have charging qc 3.0 that fill my old galaxy S10 in one hour or max 2 or my s21 even faster ....but now after my updated android my Google phone became more of a landline than a mobile it's only charging slowly  (what was I thinking when I've bought it 3 months ago... )
